title: Job Opportunity | Team Lead- Chatbot
tagsAndSkills: Chatbot,Natural Language Processing,Ai,Postman,Ml,Artificial Intelligence,Team leading,Team
jobDescription:
Greetings from Osource Global Pvt.Ltd!!!

Company Profiles:

Osource Global is where professionalism, modernity, and industry leadership converge in the realm of IT solutions and outsourcing. We are a leading platform-enabled business process management company, specializing in delivering end-to-end outsourcing solutions with our IT-products.

Were pioneers and trusted partners who've been at the forefront of innovation for over two decades. Osource has a rich legacy of 20+ years, during which we've become industry leaders, serving as trusted partners to over 850 clients worldwide, with 1000+ live projects currently.

With operations spanning India, the Middle East, and Australia, Osource Global boasts a team of over 2,200 professionals dedicated to achieving our clients' success.

Our portfolio of cutting-edge IT products caters to a wide array of industries, including Banking, Hospitality, Pharma, Media, Healthcare, and more. With a global presence spanning 29+ countries, Osource is your global partner in technology solutions. Our expertise lies in F&A Outsourcing, HR Outsourcing, Payroll Management & Software Development, Accounts Payable, Fixed Assets Management, Leave & Attendance System, Document Management Solution, HRMS and HR Operations.

What sets us apart? Our commitment to professionalism and innovation. We're agile and forward-thinking, dedicated to providing high-quality products that drive transformation in businesses worldwide.

Join us on this journey where the future meets expertise.

Company Website- www.osourceglobal.com

As per our telephone conversation please find below job description.


Responsibilities

  • Work with teams and other programmers to test, develop, deploy and maintain a chatbot (virtual assistant).
  • Develop chatbot applications that use Artificial intelligence, cognitive machine learning and NLP technologies.
  • Continually improve and maintain the Chatbot platform to meet evolving needs
  • Integrate chatbots and multiple platforms
  • Debug and deploy chatbots on a number of channels and troubleshoot bots.
  • As per requirements, refactor or reengineer chatbot applications
  • Improve user effectiveness of chatbot with the aid of cutting-edge technologies.
  • Participate in all phases of chatbot development from the architecting phase to the implementing phase.
  • Develop processes and methods to improve the end-user experience, and design and implement them.

Technical Skills and Qualifications

  • AI, NLP and ML technologies are used to build years of AI-powered chatbots from scratch.
  • Have to have knowledge of Google Dialog Flow , Rasa, along with additional chatbot development platforms
  • Understanding of the AI / chatbot development landscape, tools along with other frameworks is essential.
  • Experience working with Transformer and LSTM Networks: Hands-on experience
  • Knowledge of the software development lifecycle and different methods used.
  • Knowledge of conversational designs, flow and automatic speech recognition in-depth.
  • Strong experience in developing deep learning / artificial intelligence products.
  • Experience with algorithms, computer visions, knowledge management along with conversational AI.
  • Familiarity with agile development methods and DevOps methods.
  • Working comprehension of frontend tools - HTML, JSON, JavaScript, CSS, and Rest APIs
  • Clean coding abilities and best practices
  • Fundamental information and knowledge in MongoDB, and some other databases.
  • Understanding the business requirements and end-to-end software development processes.
  • Excellent multi-language experience and experience working with programming languages like Python and AI languages

title: INOC Engineer Level 1
tagsAndSkills: Cisco Routers,Router,Switching,Cisco

ambitionBoxData.Title: South Star Software Private Limited Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
INOC Engineer Level 1



South Star Software Pvt Ltd is looking to add a few A players to its technically elite Managed Services team. The successful candidate must be able to multi-task between projects and provide client facing support. This person will need to be able to work on his/her own and as part of a team while exhibiting excellent communication, technical architecture and troubleshooting skills in both environments. End to end responsibilities for activating complex customer networks as well as supporting them in production as Level 1, you will accept issues that are escalated to the group from various entry points. This is a high level role with technical skill required to manage Cisco/Adtran/etc. based client support offerings. The role requires an understanding of each clients business needs and how they relate to the technologies being supported.


A can-do, upbeat attitude is required, with the willingness to go the extra mile to ensure client satisfaction.


Desired Technical Proficiencies:

  • Cisco IOS Routing and Switching
  • Switching (Capacity Planning & VLANs)
  • Routing (OSPF, BGP)
  • WAN Technology (MPLS, VPLS, VPN, SD-WAN)
  • Voice Technologies (POTS, VoIP, SIP Trunking, UCaaS)
  • Firewall management

Additional Qualifications:

  • Experience mentoring network engineers
  • Experience managing network upgrade projects
  • Experience with VoIP as a Service
  • Experience in fully virtualized data centers
  • Experience supporting wireless controllers
  • Routing (RIPv2, OSPF, VRF, STP protocols)
  • Cisco certifications CCNA, a plus
  • Security software such as Anti-virus, Anti-SPAM, Anti-Spyware, and other security related technologies
  • Experience with any of the following vendors (Cisco, Fortinet, Adtran, Broadsoft, Velocloud, and Sonicwall).

Base Requirements:


Qualified candidates must have a minimum of 2.5+ years' experience working in a like role or 2+ years of experience working in the Managed Services industry.

Bachelor of Engineering / Bachelor of Science IT/CS/Telecom/Electronics

title: Aesthaderm Scientific Manager (FLE) - Derma Division
tagsAndSkills: Sales,Selling Skills,Dermatology,Skin Care,Pharma Marketing,Kol Management,Kol Development,Communicational Skills

placeholders.label: Hybrid - Navi Mumbai, Kochi, Mumbai (All Areas)

jobDescription:
Purpose of the position (Brief Overview)
Responsible for Launching, Establishing & driving the Sales in his assigned HQ, with an objective of Brand promotion, Strategies Implementation and Execution effectively, thereby to achieve the given objectives.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

  • As ASM, He should have good geographical & customer knowledge include KOL/KBL of his assigned territory.
  • He should prepare effective & potential Customer list in such a way his given targets is achievable through his set list.
  • He should be alert for new customer in his assigned hq & include them in the list for increased business.
  • ASM should implement & Execute all given Strategies by 100% .
  • He should be able to promote & communicate the products scientifically & effectively in such a way that he should be able to extract business from the drs.
  • Thereby he needs to achieve the given targets by min 100%.
  • He should be able to adapt to all challenges in his assignment & to be career conscious.
  • He should give proper feedback & reports in the prescribed format given by the company and as asked by the company and his manager.
  • He should produce desired call avg & coverage as per company objectives.
  • He should have excellent selling skills learned through his experience.

Education and Work Experience Requirements:

BSC / BPHARM
Critical Competencies, Skills, Knowledge & attributes:

  • Strong Geographical & customer knowledge.
  • A Professional manners and etiquettes with No Insubordination.
  • Self-motivated with a result-driven approach
  • Enthusiastic with strong interpersonal skills.
  • Effective communication skills
  • Effective analytical & Problem-solving Skills
  • Good at using computers.
  • Good KOL/KBL Connect.

Desirable:

Bsc / B Pharmacy
